name: Mecha-Maid
description:
Bojo's going through his anime phase, and decided what London needed was a giant mech running around helping people

Unfortunately the entire of the British defence budget was not enough to make something that actually functioned, so whoever is unfortune enough to pilot the thing would have to deal with fires, faulty wiring and constant engine failure

oh... its you... you have to pilot it

Explore London and help everyone you can!

Made for the 2021 Mech Jam II. Currently unfinished but who knows!

Is your game a video game or a physical game?  

video game

Was your game made solo or in a team? 

In a team of three!

Did you use any third party assets, if yes what assets did you use? 

lot of UI from Kenny's Game Assets, plus a lot of scrapbooked royalty free pictures to use

Did you use choose from one of the optional secondary themes? 

we chose multitasking, and made our game around the idea of having to keep the mech running while completing 

Does your game contain 18+ content (Nudity, Gore, Language)? one offhand reference to oral sex.... does that count?
